title: ATF certify bomb-sniffing dogs
text: LOUISVILLE, KY (WAVE) - A different type of graduation happened in WAVE Country on Wednesday, as a new litter of bomb sniffing dogs earned their certification. Members of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives mobile canine explosives training team certified the recently trained dogs at the Kentucky Expo Center. MORE ON WAVE3.COM+ Juvenile detention center where teen inmate died to cease operations+ Warren Co. man arrested on child pornography charges+ Police: Murder arrest made after drug deal, robbery turn deadly The dogs had to to identify peroxide based and homemade explosives and pass the National Odor Recognition Test to become a certified bomb-sniffing dog.
